title: 820-00165-a no backligt
message:
this board had slight water damage, board turns on no back light ( there is image  , i changed the led driver, 2 times, feed back line is good (A5)     , it have 8.59v on back line line, 
 known good screen,   

i notice EDP_BKLT_PWM 0v 

R7731=2.8v 

any idea

title: 820-00165-a no backligt
message: What voltage do you have on BKLT_EN? This sounds like an issue with LED Driver soldering or possibly feedback line on the front side of the board.

title: 820-00165-a no backligt
message:
Do PRAM reset few times.
If no result, remove R7704 and run a wire from R7715 to C7704.
Let see if backlight appears.

title: 820-00165-a no backligt
message:
I did that remove r7704 and and run wire from r7715 to caps still no back light 

third time i changed the drive now a5 feed back pin burn out

title: 820-00165-a no backligt
message:
Be sure to have good continuity for FB line; check XW7720 integrity.
However, BKLT_PWM signal should have some voltage before.
You didn't post its value after modded.

title: 820-00165-a no backligt
message: finally fixed, feed back was bad , thanks for help SOLVED!!!
